page.title: 03ENDFORD ENGINEERING COMPANY
page.content: The works make almost anything out of steel and concrete. They have a Multi Cropping machine which cuts and punches holes in steel. They have machines which bend, weld, drill, saw, roll and cut steel. They employ 5 welders/fabricaters, 3 concreters and 2 office staff with 5 subcontractors who erect buildings. They make concrete from gravel, sand, dust, water and cement. The concrete is set into side panels for buildings in large flat beds. Farmers are their main customers. The works were built in 1971. They have had 500_600 orders in the last year. The most popular products are farm buildings. They make 24 link boxes and 24 trailers a year. They have 4 vans, 1 car and 1 highab. They have built a gas rig for Africa and a small power station.
